query.name: Plants
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT Plant FROM PlantLayout

query.name: Departments
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT Department FROM PlantLayout WHERE Plant=?

query.name: Zones
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT Zone FROM PlantLayout WHERE Plant=? AND Department=?

query.name: WorkCells
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT WorkCell FROM PlantLayout WHERE Plant=? AND Department=?

query.name: Machines
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT Machine FROM PlantLayout WHERE Plant=? AND Department=? AND Zone=?

query.name: Subsystems
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT Part FROM PlantLayout WHERE Plant=? AND Department=? AND Zone=? AND Machine=?

query.name: Auditors
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT AuditorName FROM Auditor

query.name: Supervisors
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT SupervisorName FROM Supervisor

query.name: AccidentTypes
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT AccidentType FROM AccidentTypes

query.name: InjuryTypes
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT InjuryType FROM InjuryTypes

query.name: BodyParts
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT BodyPart FROM BodyParts

query.name: Tools
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT MoldID FROM MoldIDs

query.name: RootCauses
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT RootCause FROM vRootCause

query.name: SecondaryCauses
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT SecondaryRootCause FROM vRootCause WHERE RootCause=?

query.name: MicroCauses
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT MicroRootCause FROM vRootCause WHERE RootCause=? AND SecondaryRootCause=?

query.name: Actions
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT Action FROM vRootCause WHERE RootCause=? AND SecondaryRootCause=?

query.name: EWORootCauses
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT RootCause FROM vEWO_RootCause

query.name: EWOSecondaryCauses
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT SecondaryRootCause FROM vEWO_RootCause WHERE RootCause=?

query.name: EWOActions
query.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT Action FROM vEWO_RootCause WHERE RootCause=? AND SecondaryRootCause=?

query.name: CloseIssue
query.qstring: INSERT INTO ClosedIssues (FormName, FormNum, LineNum, ActionTaken) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)

query.name: OpenIssue
query.qstring: DELETE FROM ClosedIssues WHERE FormName=? AND FormNum=? AND LineNum=?

query.name: GetOpenIssues
query.qstring: SELECT * FROM OpenIssues

query.name: GetClosedIssues
query.qstring: SELECT * FROM ClosedIssueDetails
